hero.title: We build websites that sell and inspire
hero.subtitle: At SimplifyWeb, we turn ideas into modern, fast, and efficient digital solutions. Your website is not just a showcase – it's the engine that attracts clients and drives results.

about.title: About SimplifyWeb
about.description: At SimplifyWeb, we are dedicated to transforming our clients' ideas into efficient and modern digital solutions. We create websites that not only look good, but also generate real results for your business.
about.mission: Our mission: To provide web solutions that increase online visibility and attract the right clients.
about.values: Our values: Professionalism, transparency, innovation and dedicated client support.
about.why: Why us? Because we deliver projects on time, with attention to detail and with a design adapted to your brand.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At SimplifyWeb, we offer complete digital solutions that help your business grow online. Each service is designed to deliver real results and maximum visibility.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
cta.description: Discover our full range of urban digital services and take your business to the next level.

webDesign.title: Web Design & Development
webDesign.description: We create customized, responsive websites with modern design and features adapted to your needs.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Easy-to-manage online stores, optimized for sales and pleasant user experience.

seo.title: SEO & Optimization
seo.description: We optimize your website for search engines so you attract relevant clients and quality traffic.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: We ensure updates, backups and constant support so your website is always online and functional.

consulting.title: Digital Consulting
consulting.description: We provide strategic recommendations for your online presence and maximizing digital results.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: We improve website speed and user experience for better conversions and more traffic.

contact.title: Get In
contact.description: Ready to start your next project? Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.successDesc: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

location.title: Visit Us
location.description: Come say hello at our office

response.title: Quick Response
response.description: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

map.title: Find Us
map.description: Visit our office or get in touch with us. We're always happy to meet new clients.

footer.description: Creating exceptional urban digital experiences with sophisticated design and cutting-edge technology.
